title: Margot Adler, A Venerable And Beloved NPR Voice, Passes At 68
teaser: Longtime NPR correspondent Margot Adler died at the age of 68, after a battle with cancer. Adler's work ranged from the serious to the whimsical and often showcased her love of New York City.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
